metadata.title: CVE-2018-4376 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memoryhandling. This issue affected versions prior to iOS 12.1, watchOS 5.1,Safari 12.0.1, iTunes 12.9.1, iCloud for Windows 7.8.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-4376` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37-gtk2 - 2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
webkit2gtk package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.22.2-0ubuntu0.18.04.2').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
